title: BTB84
author: BTB84
content: Hi guys.This guy: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=982494sells these ones: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5407298.newThis guy has very rare invites to the torrent trackers.It's a huge amount, and it's too good to be true, that's why I ask for escrow, to ensure I don't lose any money by being scammed.Not hard to guess, that he didn't accept escrow.My advice is to stay away from this kind of seller.A legit seller never refused you to use a MM/escrow service.Period.

comments.author: BookAddict
comments.body: I've seen he deleted a bunch of posts.No wonder!Lucky that you didn't lose any amount, buddy!

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: The user is banned. You can close the topic.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on August 08, 2022, 09:43:59 PMThe user is banned. You can close the topic.I think it should still keep open pending investigation.Have you noticed the newbies accounts that replied the thread with seemingly fake positive reviews one after the other? Those accounts maybe worth looking into as well.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.created_time: August 08, 2022, 10:56:18 PMLast edit: August 08, 2022, 11:06:42 PM by Xal0lex
comments.body: Quite possibly. What's the point, though? Most likely these are the alts of the author of the topic, with which he tried to promote his sales. Most of them have only one post, and that is in this topic. So I personally do not see any point in watching them. If anything, they will prove themselves.
